attributes.action: Make the Government urgently address knife crime.
attributes.background: Knife crime is out of control on the streets of London, they are happening at a rate of up to THREE A DAY ! May cut the Police service and now innocent people are dying.  Politicians were verbally abused they brought in more Police around the commons, crass hypocrisy. Do the Public not count?

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about knife crime, but are not sure what action you'd like the Government or Parliament to take. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

You might also like to sign one of these petitions:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/231568
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/228088
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/233926
